The RCT - Asking Clinical Questions

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

In this week's webinar, we will discuss how to access Pubmed on mobile devices, the differences between observational research and randomized controlled trials, and how to formulate clinical questions. In addition, we will discuss the Tunis et al. 2003 and Witt 2011 articles. Please read the article and critically consider the 5 categories of challenges to CAM research listed in the article. We will also continue our statistics discussion of the P-value.

During the webinar, you will complete the In Class Exercise #3 "PICO worksheet". Please download the worksheet before class.

Due this week:

  • Summary of different types of observational research
  • Tunis et al. 2003 and Witt 2011 articles

Preparation for next class:

  • Paterson, Hull et al., Hsu et al., Marx et al., MYMOP instructions and forms
  • Due June 27th before class (9:00 am) - Complete initial post in Discussion Forum #2
